Articles.Content: Any tips for a grand tour a grand tour? Already made extreme use of the EVA pack, and stolen an idea from Stratzenblitz75's 3 parts to Ike, Duna and Minmus mission, but I need moar!

General tips for a grand tour? Well: launch a ship, fly it to all six major planets, land on each one, and then return the crew to Kerbin.  

If you're looking for more detailed advice, I recommend asking a detailed question. What exactly is it that you feel you are missing?
Land on the bodies and mine for more fuel!

3 hours ago, Fierce Wolf said:

Land on the bodies and mine for more fuel!

Mining makes things much easier. I would go to Eve first as you will need an separate lander for Eve, you can also mine on Gilly then drop down close to Eve for an cheap burn to Moho. 
Moho is kind of an problem planet, its require lots of dV to reach and the gravity is so high its a bit hard to mine it. However an lander who can do Moho can also do Val and Duna.
In short an ship who can mine Moho can go everythere and land on other bodies except Laythe and Tylo.
